title: Testing in Word
content:
While I am rigorously testing my volt rules in MS Word, every time not only I have to close the Ms word but all office application to refresh the font in "font" folder. Is there any workaround?

Thanks and regards,  
Atif
author: Atif

comments.content:
Ah. Thanks, Charles.

Can't anyone help with this question?
In both response to "Point" and your query, I think the answer is "Blank."
I've not found any work around for this. Windows won't let you delete the previous version of the font while an application that is using it is still open.
